edu.cpp.cs.cs141.GECLYfinalproj

Class Player

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.cpp.cs.cs141.GECLYfinalproj.Agent
      • edu.cpp.cs.cs141.GECLYfinalproj.Player
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Locatable, java.io.Serializable

    public class Player
extends Agent
implements Locatable, java.io.Serializable
    This class represents the Player of the game which is a subclass of the Agent abstract class. There should only ever be one instance of this class in the game at a time.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private int ammo
      This field represents the amount of ammo the Player has, which should never be greater than one.
      private boolean hasAdvancedNight
      This field represents if the Player has the effect of NightVision.
      private boolean hasCamo
      This field represents if the Player has the effect of Camo.
      private boolean hasCase
      This field represents if the Player has the Briefcase.
      private boolean hasRadar
      This field represents if the Player has the effect of Radar.
      private int invincibilityCount
      This field represents the amound of turns the Player has of invincibility, which is applied by Invincibility.
      private Action lastEvent
      Represents the last thing that happened to the player.
      private int lives
      This field represents the amount of the lives the Player has, which will be modified by the kill() method.

      • lives

        private int lives
        This field represents the amount of the lives the Player has, which will be modified by the kill() method.

      • ammo

        private int ammo
        This field represents the amount of ammo the Player has, which should never be greater than one.

      • invincibilityCount

        private int invincibilityCount
        This field represents the amound of turns the Player has of invincibility, which is applied by Invincibility.

      • hasRadar

        private boolean hasRadar
        This field represents if the Player has the effect of Radar.

      • hasAdvancedNight

        private boolean hasAdvancedNight
        This field represents if the Player has the effect of NightVision.

      • hasCamo

        private boolean hasCamo
        This field represents if the Player has the effect of Camo.

      • hasCase

        private boolean hasCase
        This field represents if the Player has the Briefcase.

      • lastEvent

        private Action lastEvent
        Represents the last thing that happened to the player. If null, then nothing important happened to them.

        Parameters:
        currentOccupant - Thing currently in spot.
        newRow - Row to look at.
        newCol - Column to look at.
        board - Board to reference.

        whether player doesn't need to move or not.

      • objectCanBeMovedOver

        public boolean objectCanBeMovedOver(Locatable l,
                                    Direction d)
        Description copied from class: Agent
        Checks whether this agent can move to a certain object in a certain direction. Returns true for players moving down into rooms, even though that does not actually result in movement.
        Specified by:
        objectCanBeMovedOver in class Agent
        Parameters:
        l - the object to be moved over
        d - the direction to move in
        Returns:
        whether a move in the specified direction to a spot on the grid containing the specified object is valid
